meta.title: Full-Stack Web Development Services — House of Agile • Switzerland • Germany
meta.description: Expert full-stack web development services for family offices and private clients in Switzerland and Germany. Symfony, Laravel, Vue.js, React, Node.js, Python, microservices architecture, and RESTful APIs.
meta.ogTitle: Full-Stack Web Development Services — House of Agile
meta.ogDescription: Expert full-stack development for sophisticated web applications. Symfony, Laravel, Vue.js, React, Node.js, Python, and modern microservices architecture.

hero.title: Sophisticated Web Applications for
hero.description: Our expert collective crafts high-performance, scalable web applications for family offices and private clients in Switzerland and Germany. From PHP and Symfony to Vue.js and React, we deliver full-stack solutions that combine technical excellence with refined user experiences.

backendDevelopment.title: Modern Backend Development
backendDevelopment.description: Expert backend development with industry-leading frameworks and languages. Our team builds robust, scalable APIs and server-side applications that power sophisticated business logic.
features: Symfony 6+ with PHP 8 for enterprise applications
Go and Rust for high-performance services

frontendDevelopment.title: Modern Frontend Development
frontendDevelopment.description: Responsive, performant user interfaces built with cutting-edge JavaScript frameworks. We create intuitive experiences that work seamlessly across devices and browsers.
features: React with modern hooks and state management
Responsive design with Tailwind CSS, Sass

apiDevelopment.title: API Design & Integration
apiDevelopment.description: Comprehensive API development and integration services. We design RESTful and GraphQL APIs that are secure, well-documented, and built for scale.
features: RESTful API design following best practices
GraphQL APIs with Apollo or equivalent
API Platform for rapid API development

microservices.title: Microservices & Distributed Systems
microservices.description: Architecture and implementation of microservices-based applications. We design resilient, independently deployable services that scale efficiently.

database.title: Database Design & Management
database.description: Expert database design and optimization for both SQL and NoSQL systems. We ensure data integrity, performance, and scalability for your applications.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce & Payment Solutions
ecommerce.description: Complete e-commerce platforms and secure payment integrations. We build custom shopping experiences with seamless checkout flows and multiple payment methods.
features: Shopify themes, apps, and API integration

cta.title: Ready to Build Your Next Application?
cta.description: Schedule a confidential consultation to discuss your full-stack development needs.
